info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 1:04AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lake, central Missoula and southeastern Sanders Counties through 145 AM MDT... At 104 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Ravalli, or 24 miles northwest of Missoula, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail along with heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ravalli, St. Ignatius, Arlee, Old Agency, Dixon, Allentown, Kicking Horse and Fort Connah. This includes Highway 93 between mile markers 17 and 41. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
